testcase.name: testValidSignup
testcase.failure:

testcase.name: testDuplicateUserSignup
testcase.failure:
Wanted but not invoked: httpServletRequest.setAttribute( "errorMessage", "Username or email already exists." ); -> at com.aryan.SignupServletTest.testDuplicateUserSignup(SignupServletTest.java:55)
However, there were exactly 4 interactions with this mock: httpServletRequest.getParameter("username"); -> at com.aryan.SignupServlet.doPost(SignupServlet.java:18)
httpServletRequest.getParameter("email"); -> at com.aryan.SignupServlet.doPost(SignupServlet.java:19)
httpServletRequest.getParameter("password"); -> at com.aryan.SignupServlet.doPost(SignupServlet.java:20)
